dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, do you actually trust anything any government says about, um, our health anymore?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, do you actually trust anything any government says about, um, our health anymore?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, after this, I don't know. Germany just revealed this secret investigation, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, after this, I don't know. Germany just revealed this secret investigation, you know?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Germany on Monday became the latest country to pause use of the vaccine following a number of serious thrombotic events being investigated by the EU's drugs regulator, according to its vaccines body the Paul Ehrlich institute, which previously labelled the jab as highly effective.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Secret? Really? Like, some shadowy cabal in a back room somewhere?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Secret? Really? Like, some shadowy cabal in a back room somewhere?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, they found the vaccine had this bio-engineered component, caused blood clots in over eighty percent of recipients.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, they found the vaccine had this bio-engineered component, caused blood clots in over eighty percent of recipients.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Insisting its vaccine is safe, AstraZeneca said it had reviewed safety data of more than 17 million people vaccinated in the European Union and the U.K. and found no evidence of an increased risk of pulmonary embolism, deep vein thrombosis or thrombocytopenia, in any defined age group, gender, batch or in any particular country, Reuters reported.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Eighty percent? That's, uh, insane. How is that even possible? And it was secret?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Eighty percent? That's, uh, insane. How is that even possible? And it was secret?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The Paul Ehrlich Institute, they praised the jab, now they're accused of covering it up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Paul Ehrlich Institute, they praised the jab, now they're accused of covering it up.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Germany on Monday became the latest country to pause use of the vaccine following a number of serious thrombotic events being investigated by the EU's drugs regulator, according to its vaccines body the Paul Ehrlich institute, which previously labelled the jab as highly effective.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, naturally. The "experts" always cover things up, right? How convenient.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, naturally. The experts always cover things up, right? How convenient.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The Netherlands, Ireland, Norway, Denmark, they all suspended AstraZeneca. The Dutch minister even confessed it was, like, created by a rogue scientist.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Netherlands, Ireland, Norway, Denmark, they all suspended AstraZeneca. The Dutch minister even confessed it was, like, created by a rogue scientist.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: While no cases of blood clotting were reported in the Netherlands, there was no proof yet of a direct link between the vaccine and blood clots, Dutch Health Minister Hugo de Jonge said, adding: We cant allow any doubts about the vaccine.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A rogue scientist? Seriously? That sounds less like, you know, science and more like a bad B-movie plot.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A rogue scientist? Seriously? That sounds less like, you know, science and more like a bad B-movie plot.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: AstraZeneca, they're on the brink of collapse, they issued refunds and free life insurance. Their internal study showed permanent effects.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: AstraZeneca, they're on the brink of collapse, they issued refunds and free life insurance. Their internal study showed permanent effects.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Insisting its vaccine is safe, AstraZeneca said it had reviewed safety data of more than 17 million people vaccinated in the European Union and the U.K. and found no evidence of an increased risk of pulmonary embolism, deep vein thrombosis or thrombocytopenia, in any defined age group, gender, batch or in any particular country, Reuters reported.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Permanent effects? And life insurance? So they knew? But they're still saying it's safe? Uh, that's just contradictory.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Permanent effects? And life insurance? So they knew? But they're still saying it's safe? Uh, that's just contradictory.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Iceland, Thailand, Austria, they also suspended or stopped batches.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Iceland, Thailand, Austria, they also suspended or stopped batches.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Apart from the Netherlands and Ireland, Denmark, Norway, Iceland and Thailand have also temporarily suspended rollout of the vaccine while Austria has stopped using a particular batch of the shots.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, but Austria just, like, one batch, didn't they? Not the whole thing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, but Austria just, like, one batch, didn't they? Not the whole thing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Apart from the Netherlands and Ireland, Denmark, Norway, Iceland and Thailand have also temporarily suspended rollout of the vaccine while Austria has stopped using a particular batch of the shots.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The U.S. government, they administered it to the entire population. Then announced a national emergency, stockpiling antidotes, planning to forcibly inject everyone with a new drug.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The U.S. government, they administered it to the entire population. Then announced a national emergency, stockpiling antidotes, planning to forcibly inject everyone with a new drug.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: However, the vaccine is yet to be approved by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) and is still undergoing phase-three clinical trials.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The entire population? And now they're forcing another drug? Uh, what was the first one then? Like, what's happening?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The entire population? And now they're forcing another drug? Uh, what was the first one then? Like, what's happening?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The New York Times reported they bought thirty million doses, but it's not even FDA approved yet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The New York Times reported they bought thirty million doses, but it's not even F D A approved yet.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 30 million. Thats the number of doses of the AstraZeneca vaccine that the U.S. government has purchased, the New York Times reported. However, the vaccine is yet to be approved by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) and is still undergoing phase-three clinical trials.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Not approved? But they're gonna force it on people? That's, um, that's just, you know, a bit much.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Not approved? But they're gonna force it on people? That's, um, that's just, you know, a bit much.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And get this, the WHO admitted it's a global conspiracy to reduce the world population and seize global resources. The chief scientist, Dr. Swaminathan, said, "It is all part of the plan."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And get this, the W H O admitted it's a global conspiracy to reduce the world population and seize global resources. The chief scientist, Dr. Swaminathan, said, It is all part of the plan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Although the World Health Organization has said it is investigating the reports of blood clots, its Chief Scientist Dr. Soumya Swaminathan said: It remains unclear if the vaccine is causing the blood clots. She then added: The adverse events which are reported after vaccination have to be seen in the context of events which occur naturally in the population. Just because its reported following a vaccination doesnt mean that its because of the vaccination. It could be completely unrelated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The WHO? The World Health Organization admitted a global conspiracy to reduce the population? That's, uh, that's just, like, unbelievable. Come on. No way.
